item.title: Single Image Unlearning: Efficient Machine Unlearning in Multimodal Large Language Models
item.description: Single Image Unlearning (SIU) efficiently removes visual data from Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) using only one image per concept, outperforming existing methods and defending against attac…
